comments.author: Snowreap.5174
comments.body:
this also affects the WvW API. world id’s are integers in https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/wvw/matches.json

-ken

comments.author: Cliff Spradlin.3512
comments.body: Sorry about that. We’re aware it’s a problem but it’s a bit painful to fix at this time.

comments.author: rodadams.5963
comments.body:
In /v1/map_names.json and /v1/world_names.json, the id’s are strings.
In /v1/events.json, they are integers.

Easily overcomable, but a mild annoyance, nonetheless.
